attributes.action: Cancel The Out dated TV Licence Once and For all
attributes.background:
More than 7+ million homes currently pay a TV licence costing them £150.50 a year

This Outdated With The More Popular Streaming Services Like Netflix - Amazon & Many More

You only Need A TV licence if you watch Live TV or Any BBC programmes

Which has now So Out dated it Need To be abolished

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions in the name of organisations.
